text: my name is Nathan I'm a recruiter for
AWS based out of the London office I
chose AWS because I wanted to make sure
I was working at a market leader
especially when you're working in
internal recruitment sense you need to
make sure that you're working somewhere
that you believe is right at the top of
the pecking order that way when you're
making these offers to candidates you
can bring a really good proposition to
them we're obviously the front line that
deals with these external candidates and
we're in the best position to obviously
give them a good first impression with
the company
the on board is the best that I've come
across it's got so many different facets
and features to it so you can make sure
it's completely kind of tailored around
what you're looking for and what you
want to achieve within the role it's
such a kind of collaborative team that
we work in that you need a lot of inputs
and examples from different backgrounds
I think diversity is hugely important
for AWS especially when you think of the
scale of the company the main tip I give
is just to be yourself
